dashboard.title: HOME
dashboard.subtitle: View your available resources and an overview of your account
dashboard.welcome_description:
From the dashboard, you can manage and create servers.

Upgrade your servers: you can earn free {{currency}} via our Discord {{discord}} or through other methods.
dashboard.resources_below_zero: Your resources are somehow below zero. Please click here to fix it or your servers could get suspended. If that doesn't work, try editing your servers to fix it.

daily_reward.title: Your daily reward is available.
daily_reward.description:
As a thank you for being a {{name}} user, each day you can claim a reward of {{amount}} ({{currency}})
Click the button below to claim your reward!

advent_calendar.title: Advent Calendar
advent_calendar.description: Our advent calendar has started on November 1 and will end on December 25!

support.title: Support
support.description: If you need any assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team via Discord or the support ticket system.

alerts.daily_claimed: Action completed - daily rewards ({{amount}} {{currency}}) have been claimed!
alerts.server_created: Action completed - provisioning has started for your server, it may take up to 5 minutes to complete.
alerts.server_modified: Action completed - the server's resources have been modified.
alerts.server_deleted: Action completed - the server has been deleted.

account.title: SFTP Credentials
account.subtitle: View and manage the credentials to your SFTP.
account.description: Use these credentials to access certain actions such as SFTP.

messages.error_occurred: An error occurred while updating the password.
messages.no_password: No password available: passwords are only shown once.

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information
profile.delete_warning: Deleting your account is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted.
profile.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.

afk.title: AFK Page
afk.subtitle: Earn free rewards for keeping this page open.

connection_status.title: Connection Status
connection_status.already_open: AFK page already open in another tab
connection_status.session_expired: Session expired. Please refresh the page.
connection_status.connection_failed: Connection failed. Please refresh the page.

referrals.title: Referrals
referrals.subtitle: Refer users to {{name}} for free rewards.

benefits.title: Referral Benefits
benefits.you_earn: For every friend who uses your code
benefits.friend_earns: When they claim your referral code

messages.enter_claim_code: Please enter a referral code to claim.

servers.title: My Servers
servers.subtitle: Overview of your servers on {{name}}.
servers.get_started: Get started by creating your first server

alerts.suspended_body: Your server has been suspended. Please contact support via our Discord ({{discord}}) for more information.

staking.title: Staking
staking.subtitle: Earn compound interest rewards by staking your {{currency}}.

migration.title: Staking System Upgrade
migration.description: We've upgraded our staking system with new features! Your existing stake has been automatically migrated. You now have access to:
migration.feature_2: Higher rewards for longer lock periods

positions.title: Your Staking Positions
positions.no_positions: No active staking positions. Start earning rewards by creating a new stake!
positions.error: Failed to load staking positions. Please try again later.

modal.early_warning_text: This position is still locked. Unstaking now will result in a 50% penalty on earned rewards.

messages.confirm_unstake: Are you sure you want to unstake this position?
messages.confirm_unstake_early: Are you sure you want to unstake early? You will lose 50% of your earned rewards.

store.title: Store
store.subtitle: Manage your resources and subscriptions with {{currency}}

ui.history_will_appear: Your billing history will appear here.

renewal_bypass.title: Special Offer
renewal_bypass.need_more: You need {{amount}} more coins to purchase this.
renewal_bypass.headline: Renewal Bypass
renewal_bypass.description: Never worry about weekly store renewals or renewing your server every 48 hours again. Purchase our Renewal Bypass for {{price}} coins and keep your resources and servers forever.

messages.transfer_generic_error: An error occurred during the transfer. Please try again.

hero.title: Premium Game Server Hosting
hero.subtitle: Deploy your game servers instantly with our powerful and reliable hosting platform.

instant_deploy.title: Instant Deployment
instant_deploy.description: Deploy your servers in seconds with our automated system

high_performance.title: High Performance
high_performance.description: Powered by enterprise-grade hardware for optimal performance

ddos_protection.title: DDoS Protection
ddos_protection.description: Advanced protection to keep your servers online 24/7

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team is always here to help you succeed

content.developers_pitch: Built for developers who need reliable infrastructure without the complexity

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the resources you need
pricing.free_description: Everything you need to build and scale your applications

footer.copyright: Â© {{year}} {{name}}, Powered by Heliactyl. All rights reserved.
footer.about: {{name}} has been created to provide game servers hosting {{scope}}.

subdomains.title: Subdomains
subdomains.subtitle: Add custom domains to your server (Maximum 2)
subdomains.empty_desc: Add a custom domain to make your server easier to remember
subdomains.rules: Only letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed
subdomains.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete {{fqdn}}?

subusers.title: Subusers
subusers.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to remove this subuser?
subusers.no_subusers: No subusers found. Add a subuser to get started!
subusers.load_error: Error loading subusers. Please refresh the page.
subusers.add_error: An error occurred while adding the subuser. Please try again.
subusers.remove_error: An error occurred while removing the subuser. Please try again.
subusers.enter_email: Please enter a valid email address.

transfer.experimental_desc: Server transfer is an experimental feature. Please be aware of the following risks:
transfer.risk_2: Transfer may fail for large servers
transfer.risk_3: Process cannot be reversed once started
transfer.risk_4: Server will be unavailable during transfer
transfer.title: Transfer Server to New Node
transfer.ack: By proceeding with the transfer, you acknowledge the risks involved and understand that this process cannot be undone.
transfer.confirm_text: This will initiate a server transfer to Node {{nodeId}}. Your server will be unavailable during the transfer, and there is a risk of data loss. Are you sure you want to proceed?
transfer.initiated_text: Server transfer has been initiated. Please allow a few minutes for the transfer to complete. If it has not completed within 10 minutes, your server may be too large to transfer or the node may be experiencing issues.
transfer.error_text: An unexpected error occurred while transferring the server.

errors.missing_params: Missing required parameters: id or nodeId
errors.no_allocations: No available allocations on the target node

success.initiated: Transfer for server {{id}} to node {{nodeId}} initiated.

worlds.drag_drop: Drag and drop your world file here

errors.provide_both: Please provide both world name and file

create.low_capacity_cpu: This location only allows up to 2.5 CPU cores to be used due to low capacity.

edit.panel_subtitle: After purchasing extra resources, you can apply them here by editing the server.

import.title: Server Import
import.subtitle: Transfer files from another server using SFTP

modal.size_notice_text: Server imports are limited to 5GB to prevent memory issues. Larger servers should be transferred manually.

messages.required_fields: Please fill in all required fields

logs.title: Activity Logs
logs.subtitle: Track all actions performed on your server

manage.console_hint: Send commands to your server, view important logs and more.
manage.renewal_subtitle: Your server needs to be renewed every {{renewal}} hours to prevent automatic shutdown
manage.why_renew: Why do I need to renew my server?
manage.why_renew_text: To ensure optimal resource allocation and prevent inactive servers from consuming resources, all servers must be renewed every {{renewal}} hours. Servers that aren't renewed will be automatically stopped until renewed. This helps us maintain good performance for active users and reduce unnecessary resource usage.
manage.when_renew_text: At the {{threshold}} hour mark you can renew your server (a button will pop up). It's as simple as just clicking "Renew Now" and that's it.
manage.renewed_success_message: Your server has been successfully renewed for another {{renewal}} hours.
manage.renew_failed_text: Failed to renew server. Please try again.
manage.unable_send: Unable to send command. Please check your connection.
manage.eula_text: You need to agree to the Minecraft End User License Agreement (EULA) to run this server. By accepting, you confirm that you have read and agree to Mojang's terms.
manage.eula_accepted_text: The Minecraft EULA has been accepted, and the server is restarting.
manage.eula_failed_text: An error occurred while accepting the EULA. Please try again.

plugins.error_loading: Error loading plugins. Please try again later.
plugins.installed_success: Plugin installed successfully! You will need to restart your server for it to take effect.
plugins.install_error: An error occurred while installing the plugin. Please try again later.

settings.password_hint: Password can be found under "SFTP Credentials" in the main sidebar
settings.warning_text: This action will completely reset your server to its default state. All files, databases, and configurations will be permanently deleted.
settings.danger_text: This action is irreversible. All server data, including files, databases, and configurations, will be permanently deleted. The server's resources will be returned to your account.
settings.subuser_sftp_text: Since you are a subuser, you need to use the server owner's SFTP credentials. Please ask them to provide you with them.
settings.confirm_update_text: Are you sure you want to update the Docker image and startup command? This may require a server restart and could very easily go wrong if you do not know what you are doing. After performing this action, you will be automatically re-logged in. This is so we can fetch the latest Docker image settings from your server.
settings.update_error: An error occurred while updating advanced settings
settings.rename_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to rename the server to "{{name}}"?
settings.rename_error: An error occurred while renaming the server
settings.reinstall_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to reinstall the server? This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost.
settings.reinstall_error: An error occurred while reinstalling the server
settings.delete_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to delete the server? This action cannot be undone and all data will be lost.

404.heading: Page Not Found
404.description: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist.
404.fallback_log: The requested resource could not be found on this server.

500.heading: Internal Server Error
500.description: Oops! Something went wrong on our end.

banned.title: Account Suspended
banned.description: Your account has been suspended due to a violation of our terms of service.

antialt.title: Account Flagged for Alts
antialt.description: Your account has been flagged for potentially using alts (which violates {{name}}'s User Agreement). Please contact support to resolve this, and read our User Agreement before continuing. You can still log in from the original / main account, it has not been blocked.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account.
login.modal_btn: I'm not a robot or AI language model.

errors.account_creation_failed: Failed to create account. Please try again or contact support.
errors.server_error: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.generic: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
errors.generic_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.request_failed: Failed to process request. Please try again.

success.magic_link_sent: Magic link sent! Check your email.
success.reset_link_sent: Password reset link sent! Check your email.

register.subtitle: Welcome to the ecosystem!
register.have_account: Already have an account? Sign in

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
